originalText.text: All I can say is THANK GOD The West Village Cat Sitter & Manhattan Kitties exist in the world! They give exceptional cat care with incredible communication and reliability. I am so impressed with the entire team and the peace of mind knowing that my sweet kitty Richard is being so well cared for while I'm away is such a blessing. Mean it when I say it: if you're looking for the highest quality cat sitting in NYC, this is it. Thank you to Sylvie and Vicky for all that you do! Love, Lisa & Richard

originalText.text: Superlative service. So pleased to discover WVCS/Manhattan Kitties. Despite being nervous about leaving my two kitties, Sylvie placed me at ease beforehand on arrangements, what to expect, cost, etc. Sitter Vicky was Fabulous, dependable and wonderful with kitties. I received a report with pics twice a day. Really made me feel secure that kitties had A+ care. Wish I could travel with my cats, but WVCS is next best. Can't give enough praise and highly recommend.

originalText.text:
I have been in search of a reliable cat sitting service since I moved to NYC to have as a backup in case friends or family are unavailable, and literally 3 years into my residency I came across Sylvie and her team. From the moment I sent over an inquiry to the very last day that Jee (BEST CAT SITTER EVER) sent an update, I felt comfortable and confident leaving Greg in their care. Sylvie answered every single one of my questions and was so friendly and welcoming. Jee sent twice daily comprehensive reports while she was taking care of Greg including pics and the funniest videos. If I'm being totally honest, Jee spoiled Greg rotten. I think he had more fun with her in a week than he has with me daily.  The litter box was sparkling every day, food dishes cleaned and water changed, Jee even brought Greg special treats and toys!

10/10 experience and would highly recommend it to anyone in need of a cat sitter in the West Vil/Chelsea area!

originalText.text: I had a GREAT experience with the West Village Cat Sitters/Manhattan Kitties. Sylvie was wonderful to work with ahead of my trip, and the sitter, Jee, was fantastic about communication, and sent lots of photos that I looked forward to receiving every day. They made me feel much less anxious about leaving my cat with someone new while I was away. I would definitely use them again!

text.text: I had a GREAT experience with the West Village Cat Sitters/Manhattan Kitties. They made me feel much less anxious about leaving my cat with someone new while I was away. I would definitely use them again!

originalText.text: After years of not having a go-to cat sitter, I have finally found the one! I'm so glad I was matched with Penelope through Sylvie. Penelope did a wonderful job looking after my cat--She truly went above and beyond to make sure my cat's needs were being met while I was away. I no longer need to worry about finding someone to look after my cat while I'm away! :) Thank you Sylvie & Penelope
